Ataman udario po Miciću, pa napustio konferenciju: Promašio je sve trojke, to ima veze sa neprofesionalizmom (VIDEO)
Žustre reči i reakcija turskog stratega

01 Nov 2019

Trener Anadolu Efesa Ergin Ataman šestoko je opleo po svojim igračima nakon sinoćnog poraza od Panatinaikosa u Atini, a na direktnom udaru bio je i srpski plejmejker Vasilije Micić, čiji je učinak na ovom meču temperamentni turski strateg povezao čak i sa neprofesionalnošću.
Pored Micića, Ataman je kritike adresirao i ka hrvatskom košarkašu Krunoslavu Simonu."Panatinaikos je odigrao odlično, a mi užasno. Imali smo očajno šutersko veče, gađali smo samo 6/30 za tri poena. Micić i Kruno su dva šutera, a imali su 1/15 za tri zajedno. Naš plejmejker je imao sedam izgubljenih lopti. Neprihvatljivo mi je da jedan igrač, nakon što je bio najkorisniji akter meča od pre dva dana, izgubi toliki broj lopti i promaši svih šest trojki. To ima veze sa neprofesionalizmom. Ovo je tek početak sezone, Evroliga je veoma jaka. Ali moramo da menjamo neke stvari u našem pristupu i mentalitetu, jer ćemo imati još duplih programa tokom sezone", rekao je Ataman.
Ipak, potom je usledila još burnija reakcija i napuštanje konferencije, kada je usledio zahtev novinara da obrazloži kritike na račun Vasilija Micića."Ovo je pres konferencija i mogu da kažem šta mislim", poručio je Ataman i napustio prostoriju.
Ergin Ataman abruptly exited the press conference after a question regarding his criticism of Vasilije Micic's performance pic.twitter.com/Rrv3dZgdQh— Eurohoops.net (@Eurohoopsnet) October 31, 2019

Ataman slams Micic and leaves the conference: Missed all three, this has to do with unprofessionalism (VIDEO)
The harsh words and reaction of a Turkish strategist

01 Nov 2019

Anadolu Efes coach Ergin Ataman chewed on his players after losing to Panathinaikos in Athens last night, and Serbian playmaker Vasilije Micić was the direct hit, whose performance in this match was linked even by unprofessional Turkish strategist.
In addition to Micic, Ataman also addressed the criticism of Croatian basketball player Krunoslav Simon. "Panathinaikos played great, and we did horribly. We had a desperate shooting night, we only shot 6/30 for three points. Micic and Kruno had two shots, and they had two 1/15 for three together. Our playmaker had seven lost balls.It is unacceptable for one player, after being the most useful player of the match two days ago, to lose so many balls and miss all six threes. This has to do with unprofessionalism. This is just the beginning of the season, the Euroleague is very strong. But we have to change some things in our approach and mentality, because we will have more double programs during the season, "Ataman said.
However, there was an even more violent reaction and leaving the conference, when a request from a journalist to explain the criticism of Vasil Micić followed. "This is a press conference and I can say what I think," Ataman said, leaving the room.
